abstract: ESPN forms a unit, named CreativeWorks, that will produce advertising campaigns with sports themes for marketers.
snippet: ESPN forms a unit, named CreativeWorks, that will produce advertising campaigns with sports themes for marketers.
lead_paragraph: In Tuesday’s New York Times, Stuart Elliott and Brian Stelter report that ESPN, a unit of The Walt Disney Company, has something new to share with media buyers at its upfront presentation Tuesday morning:

headline.main: Upfronts: ESPN Adds Ad Creation Arm
